emails.subject: Alpha signal for {{company_name}} - consumer sentiment data
emails.body_text:
Hi {{first_name}},

Managing a portfolio at {{company_name}} means you're constantly looking for edges that aren't priced in yet.

Quick question: Are you currently using consumer sentiment data as a leading indicator for your consumer discretionary positions?

We track real-time sentiment across 500k+ retail/restaurant locations. Our signals have shown:

• 14-day advance warning on sentiment shifts
• 67% accuracy on direction prediction
• 1.8 Sharpe ratio over 6-month track record

Example: Our system flagged Starbucks NYC sentiment deterioration 2 weeks before their last earnings miss.

Would a 15-min call to see our methodology make sense?

Best,
Simon
ReviewSignal.ai

P.S. We're offering pilot access to 5 funds this quarter.

emails.preview: Case study: How we caught the Chipotle sentiment shift
emails.body_text:
Hi {{first_name}},

Following up on my note about consumer sentiment signals.

Quick case study that might interest you:

In Q3 2025, our system detected a 23% sentiment drop across Chipotle locations in Texas and California - 18 days before their earnings report.

The stock dropped 8% post-earnings on "unexpected" same-store sales decline.

Our subscribers had advance warning.

The signal came from analyzing 12,000+ reviews showing increased complaints about portion sizes and wait times - issues that directly impact foot traffic and revenue.

This is the kind of alternative data edge we provide.

Worth a quick conversation?

Simon

emails.subject: 15 min to show you our track record?
emails.body_text:
{{first_name}},

I know your inbox is full, so I'll keep this brief.

We've generated 72 signals over the past 6 months with:
• 67% directional accuracy
• 1.8 Sharpe ratio
• Average 14-day holding period

The methodology is simple:
1. We scrape 50k+ reviews daily from Google Maps, Yelp, etc.
2. NLP extracts sentiment trends by location
3. ML models flag anomalies before they hit financials

I'd love to walk you through a live demo - takes 15 minutes.

How's your calendar Thursday or Friday?

Simon
